items.summary: Update the HTML document title in frontend/index.html so the <title> content is exactly "Barnabus, The Undeterred".

Remove the Wall of Fame testing behavior that allows downloading a certificate without completing the game: only render the "Download Your Certificate" button when the local completion flag indicates the player has completed the game (hasCompleted === true).

When the certificate download button is shown (player has completed), generate the certificate using the completed player's Wall of Fame entry (playerEntry) rather than the last entry in the list; if no matching player entry is found, keep the button disabled.
